NuWa DetSim DsFastMuonStackAction
==================================

Source
---------

* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/browser/dybgaudi/trunk/Simulation/DetSim/src/DsFastMuonStackAction.h
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/browser/dybgaudi/trunk/Simulation/DetSim/src/DsFastMuonStackAction.cc

History Log
~~~~~~~~~~~~

* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/log/dybgaudi/trunk/Simulation/DetSim/src/DsFastMuonStackAction.h
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/log/dybgaudi/trunk/Simulation/DetSim/src/DsFastMuonStackAction.cc

* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/10935    Birthed by Maxim 
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/11026    protection is added to avoid scaling photons with high weight. 
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/13126    The optional 300 ns cut is added to DsFastMuonstackAction 
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/13142    timecut addition 
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/13553    David : debug
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/13694    David : debug overhaul
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/13771    David : more debug
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/13868    David : tentative fix so that optical photons are only weighted in regions specified by user
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/13921    Tentative fix for #953, use contrived string to create a TouchableName that can be used as key in map.

  * http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/ticket/953 Touchables cache, string key discussion

* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/13938    David : clean up debug code. #953 is resolved 
* http://dayabay.ihep.ac.cn/tracs/dybsvn/changeset/14032    David : Addition of dynamic weighting
